name: soporteclinico.com
description: test done to get a job

scripts.deploy-proj: npm run compile-proj1 && npm run compile-proj2
scripts.compile-proj1: cd client/ && npm run build && cd .. && git add . && git commit
scripts.i-a: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently " cd client && npm start " " npm run server "
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client

author: Luis G. Sandoval
